mapper.select: select t1.* from (SELECT t1.`ACCOUNT`, '一月' AS `CURMONTH`, (DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y')) AS `CURYEAR`, t1.`DEPT`, t1.`ID`, (case when t1.role in ('dev','td','pm') then 'dev' when t1.role in ('qd','qa') then 'qa' else 'po' end) AS `JUDGEROLE`, 0 AS `MONTESTIMATE`, 0 AS `MONTHFINISHTASK`, 0 AS `MONTRESOLVEDBUG`, t1.`REALNAME`, t1.`ROLE`, CONCAT_WS('',(DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y')),'年工作内容统计一览表 —— ',t1.realname) AS `TITLE`, t1.`VISITS`, (select count(1) from zt_action t where t.actor = t1.account and t.action = 'login' and DATE_FORMAT(t.date,'%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y')) AS `YEARACTIONCNT`, 0 AS `YEARBUGCNT`, 0 AS `YEARCASECNT`, (select sum(t.consumed) from zt_taskestimate t where t.ACCOUNT = t1.account and DATE_FORMAT(t.date,'%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y')) AS `YEARESTIMATECNT`, (select COUNT(1) from zt_taskestimate t where t.ACCOUNT = t1.account and DATE_FORMAT(t.date,'%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y')) AS `YEARLOGCNT`, 0 AS `YEARPLANCNT`, 0 AS `YEARPRODUCTCNT`, 0 AS `YEARSTORYCNT`, (select count(1) from zt_action t where t.actor = t1.account and t.action = 'login' and DATE_FORMAT(t.date,'%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y')) AS `YEARVISITS` FROM `zt_user` t1 ) t1 where id=#{id}
